level.heading: PUBLIC BENEFITS CASES – REQUESTING RECONSIDERATION, A NEW HEARING, ORELIEF FROM A FINAL ORDER (ยง 1-2978)

level.text: Motions for reconsideration, a new hearing, or relief from a final order shall be decided according to the Rules found in Section 2828.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 53 DCR 2009, 2015 (March 17, 2006); as amended by Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 12541, 12591 (December 31, 2010).
